code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{CommandType}from'../../../commands/commandTypes';import styles from'./AddCommand.module.css';import TypeSpecificFields from"../TypeSpecificFields/TypeSpecificFields";import useSaveCommands from"../../../dataAccess/useSaveCommands";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddCommand=()=>{const saveCommands=useSaveCommands();const[newCommand,setNewCommand]=useState({name:"",shortcut:"",type:CommandType.Navigate});const handleSelectChange=e=>{const{value}=e.target;setNewCommand(prev=>({...prev,type:value,...(value===CommandType.Navigate?{url:""}:{textToCopy:""})}));};const handleInputChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setNewCommand(prev=>({...prev,[name]:value}));};const handleSubmit=()=>{saveCommands(newCommand);};const commandValues=Object.values(CommandType);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.container,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:styles.title,children:"Add Command"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{className:styles.label,children:["Name:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:styles.input,type:"text",name:"name",value:newCommand.name||"",onChange:handleInputChange})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{className:styles.label,children:["Shortcut:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:styles.input,name:"shortcut",value:newCommand.shortcut||"",onChange:handleInputChange})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{className:styles.label,children:["Type:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("select",{name:"type",className:styles.commandType,value:newCommand.type,onChange:handleSelectChange,children:commandValues.map(value=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:value,children:value},value))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TypeSpecificFields,{commandData:newCommand,onFieldChange:handleInputChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:styles.saveButton,onClick:handleSubmit,children:"Add Command"})]});};export default AddCommand;
